label: 下司
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: An estate manager, commonly one of the major commenders of the land composing a shōen. The particular office most often replaced by a Kamakura-appointed jitō.　[荘園、地頭]　[Cf. Mass, 1976.]　[Also read げし]
